onset.Description: Position (latency) of event marker in seconds relative to the start.

duration.Description: Duration of the event. In this dataset, most of the duration values are arbitrarily set to 1.

sample.Description: Position (latency) of event marker relative to the start, in data frames.

HED.stim_ON: (Def/stim, Onset), (Delay/400 ms, {duration}, (Visual-presentation, (Background-view, label/{background}), (Foreground-view, (Peripheral-view, (Circle, Item-count/4, (Radius, Angle/2 degree))), (Luminance-contrast, Fraction/{forground_contrast}), (Spatial-relation, Label/{stimulue_cond})))

event_code.Description: The original code used during data collection to indicate an event marker
